Name: Pinotage
Wine Description: Intense plum red colour extends to the edge of the glass. Cherries and vanilla on the nose follow through on the palate. This lightly wooded wine shows hints of spice and has robust tannins which add to its complexity.

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: Deep, bright ruby-brick red colour.Aroma powerful, complex, warm nose with elegant aged bouquet. Ripe and fresh fruit notes blended with spicy, vanilla and toast hints.Palate complex, velvet bouquet with ripe red-fruit notes. Well balanced tannins content adds structure and elegance. Toasts, vanillas and balsamic hints on the backbone. Long and lingering finish.

Name: Rioja Reserva
Wine Description: Elegant and deep garnet colour with cherry rim. Demonstrates a seductive and complex nose with mature fruit dominating while subtely combining with chocolate and cinnamon over a sweet and spicy base. This wine is favourful and smooth on the palate showing a silky sensation. Fresh and powerful with notes of cocoa and toffee standing out. a modern wine, enveloping and complex with great keeping potential.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Brilliant garnet-red color, with warmer tinges developing over time. Unmistakeable bouquet, very pleasant, intense yet ethereal, very persistent, at times spiced, with aromas of truffles, liquorice and dried flowers. Dry taste, with important, full tannins.

Name: Gertrude Toscana
Wine Description: Rich ruby color and divine aromas of sweet cherry, cigar box, and vanilla! This little piggy who's label represents the rare Cinta Senese Heirloom pig, native to Tuscany and prized for their uniquely flavored meats, has bright flavors of it's own of raspberry, cola, rhubarb, and a tingly eucalyptus and spice finish.

Name: Barolo Castiglione
Wine Description: Pale ruby color with garnet hues and powerful aromas of rich, ripe cherries with intricate complexities of spice, tea leaves and rose petals. With strong, rich tannins, crisp acidity and masculine structure, this ageworthy Barolo shows incredible finesse with excellent balance, integration and a long, lingering finish.

Name: Viña Bosconia Reserva
Wine Description: This wine has evolved perfectly showing a deep ruby ​​color with shades of orange. His nose is persistent, showing lots of fruit, mainly dominated by Tempranillo and Its taste is round, full-bodied, soft, fine and persistent.

Name: Bramare Malbec Lujan de Cuyo
Wine Description: Aromas of pepper, cloves, cinnamon and other spices, along with black fruits and roses.

Name: Reserve Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon
Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This Pinot Noir is deep garnet colored and medium bodied which expresses bright cherry notes and is backed with clove and star anise notes. The palate carries through with fleshy cherry and spices and is deftly balanced with the acidity

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: It has ripe cherry, softened by floral notes of violets very elegant. In the mouth, the entrance fully demonstrates the strength of the product, as demonstrated by a body with good structure where the tannins found the right balance with the alcohol component.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The grapes for INTRINSIC Wine Co. are sourced predominately from renowned vineyard sites throughout the Columbia Valley and Horse Heaven Hills American Viticultural Areas (AVAs) in Washington State. INTRINSIC has tremendous complexity and imparts raw characteristics because 50% of the grapes stayed on theskins after fermentation for approximately 9 months (average time from crush to press for red wine is under a month). This extended maceration extracted the intrinsic qualities of the grape, mellowed tannins, and created an unexpected silky texture. The INTRINSIC Cabernet Sauvignon has a wonderful floral nose, complemented by aromas of cherry and leather. The flavors are layered with tones of blueberry jam, pomegranate and chocolate. The texture is rustic, yet silky, with a unique savory and inviting finish. The INTRINSIC Red Blend opens with refined notes of raspberry, white tea leaves, a hint of fresh mint and lavender. The flavors are layered with milk chocolate,fig reduction, dark plum and licorice root, and the texture is angular, yet sophisticated, with chocolate ganache details in the finish.

Name: Fontalloro
Wine Description: A rich, brilliant ruby red. Good spice on the nose, with generous notes of tobacco and wet earth (and of dry earth as well). The palate is supported by a hefty charge of medium-smooth tannins to ensure the required lengthy ageing. Superb weight and structure, with a classic finish. Significant cellarability in great vintages.

Name: Monleale
Wine Description: It has a poured into the cup has a color garnet and lively reflexes. Approached the nose , especially after a good oxygenation, intoxicated with so much chocolate, sour cherry in alcohol, balsamic and vegetal notes with a prevalence of sage.

Name: Sancerre Rouge
Wine Description: Ruby red, with orange reflections.The first nose has a discrete spicy note, with a hint of graphite. With aeration it opens up to reveal violet, kirsch and cherry stone perfumes.A supple attack, with a tannic structure, gently enlivened by polished and smooth tannins. The final lingers on notes of cherry spirit.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: An intense spice filled nose gives way to delicious black raspberry and black cherry.The palate is full of textural, mouth-coating tannins balanced with a bright acidity.

Name: El Castro de Valtuille Mencía Joven
Grower Series Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The nose leans towards dark cherry, red raspberry and spicy earth, while the middle palate is lush and graceful. On the back end, the wine builds density and focus as the silky yet, subtly firm tannins build into the long, energetic finish.

Name: Reserva Rioja
Wine Description: Bright deep garnet colour. Aromas of red fruits blended with notes of vanilla and spices. The mouth is structured, fleshy and filling.

Name: Secret del Priorat
Wine Description: An intense nose that reveals the passage of time. A predominance of spiced notes (licorice, curry, chocolate) along with plum and blackberry jam, accompanied by a hint of chamomile tea, toasted dried fruit and nuts. Very sweet upon entry, giving way to a very concentrated, fresh palate and ending in a long, elegant finish. Perfect as an aperitif paired with blue or creamy cheeses. Also a good match with duck confit. Truly surprising when combined with either chocolate coulant or mousse or with wine poached pears.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine shows lush, dark berry flavours and has silky tannins. It has a long, sumptuous finish, truly regal.

Name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Swirling with layered aromas of fresh red raspberry, blackberry pie and ripe cassis, this deep ruby wine enraptures the senses with fragrant dried violet, gingersnap, dark cocoa and sweet basil impressions. Plush and exuberant, the palate opens with red cherry, juicy boysenberry and red plum fruits that intermingle with hints of cinnamon stick and graham cracker pie crust.

Name: Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: Light ruby red colour, with scent of rose and violet. Fresh and fruity palate with smooth and delicate tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich, vibrant purple and red hues present. Blackberry and ripe currant aromas combine with black pepper, anise, toasted oak and smoky roasted mocha. Flavors of black plum and cassis complement flavors of roasted coffee bean and licorice. A structured wine with fine texture, length, flavor and style.

Name: Clos del Portal Negre de Negres
Wine Description: Concentrated aromas of cassis, cola, and cherry exude from the nose. So much intensity of the palate with lots of juicy fruit combined with baking spice, and mouth coating tannin. While it’s still very young.

Name: Château Gillet Bordeaux Rouge
Wine Description: Deep, sustained colour. Red fruits aromas. Powerful entry but supple with very tight tannins.

Name: Two Left Feet Red Blend
Wine Description: Its brings richness as well as depth and the Cabernet provides firm tannins and dark blackberry flavours. The combination creates great complexity but also great length, mocha and spice are the lasting flavours but each new taste shows more attractive fruit and delicious flavours.

Name: La Mascota Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: La Mascota Cabernet Franc is a ruby red wine with subtle violet hues, and intense, concentrated aromas evoking cassis, blackcurrants and sweet spices such as black pepper and clove. In the mouth, this perfectly structured wine displays ripe red fruit flavours with notes of eucalyptus and black pepper. An elegant, perfectly balanced wine, with a well-structured, lingering finish.

Name: Vatan Tinta de Toro
Wine Description: Inky ruby. Bright red fruits and spicecake on the highly perfumed nose, with sexy incense and floral notes adding nuance. Deep, sweet and energetic, boasting excellent clarity and vibrancy to its blackberry and bitter cherry flavors. Silky tannins build on the long, pliant, scented finish

Name: Gran Reserva
Wine Description: Deep black-cherry colour, almost opaque. Very elegant, complex nose, with aromas of black fruit and lots of spice. It is smooth and round in the mouth, with tannins which are firm, yet silky and very sweet and which envelop the whole palate. The finish is long, lingering, fresh and balanced with a hint of fine elegant tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Our fruit-forward Pinot Noir opens with pomegranate and red licorice on the nose, giving way to bright cherry, mushroom, and toasty oak on the palate. This structured Pinot is complimented best when served with a salmon dish or roasted chicken.

Name: Castelgreve Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Deep ruby ​​red color. It presents a complex bouquet, elegant with notes of ripe fruit and tertiary aromas such as vanilla. The taste is soft and balanced wine with a lingering finish.

Name: Cuvée Alexandre Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Color: Deep red with dark purple hints. Nose: Dense nose full of black and red fruit aromas such as plums; dry tea leaves and tobacco flavors. Palate: Good tannic structure. Concentrated body with balance and length. Round mid palate with a long lasting finish.

Name: Barbaresco Rabaja
Wine Description: Its a intense and ethereal perfume with fresh notes of violets and small fruits that evolve into scents of spices, cocoa, tobacco and dry fruit as is ages. A full dry and robust flavour with a rich and harmonious structure; garnet red colour.

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: This full bodied blend of Touriga Nacional, Syrah, Tinta Roriz and Alicante Bouschet features intense color with ripe black fruit and spicy flavors, well balanced with smooth tannins and a long, full and pleasant finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich varietal character and body, firm structure. Generous tannins and depth of color complement classic aromas and flavors of black currant, cassis, dusty cocoa and tobacco.

Name: Estate Grown Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: Deeply smoky aromas with notes of basil, vanilla, chocolate and coffee jump out of the glass. A weighty, fully bodied wine with grippy tannins, bright acid and ripe fruit on the palate. Long finish with flavours of dark fruit, baking spices, chocolate, coffee and tobacco.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense ruby red. Its bouquet is full and persistent, reminiscent of violets, raspberry, and pomegranate. On the palate it is warm, dry, generous and well balanced.

Name: Les Roches de Yon Figeac Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Domaine Danielle Laurent Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The aromatics are giving and voluptuous with notes of black cherry, leather, mint, bramble and hints of red cedar. On the mouth it has a certain refined elegance with soft tannins, violets, earth and cassis. Enjoy now or cellar through.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of blueberry, blackberry, mocha, milk chocolate and toffee, give this wine a wonderful impact on palate and nose.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Aromas of roasted strawberry, rose petals, fig and black raspberry with hints of fresh earth and tobacco leaf. Flavors of black cherry and wild berry with pronounced cola spice and notes of cocoa on the long, luxurious finish. Flower and earth, fruit and spice.

Name: Special Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A deep ruby red colour, with complex aromas of black cherries, tobacco and cinnamon. With a great concentration this wine has good structure on the palate with soft tannins and a long finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of boysenberry, blueberry, spice and sandalwood with graceful structured body. Flavours of black plum, graphite, cinnamon hearts, cherry cola, forest floor, oolong tea and a faint whisper of watermelon meander across the palate into a lively, bright and very flavourful finish.

Name: CrossBarn Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of strawberry and spice accompany deep ruby color, preparing the senses for a rich, satin-textured palate. Accents of earth and Earl Grey tea wrap around pure flavors of red fruits and Bing cherry, with supple tannins and balanced acidity rounding out the finish.

Name: Neromora Aglianico
Wine Description: It has Neromora of Vinosia seen in dark, almost black ruby ​​red. On the nose, notes of dark, cooked fruit such as blackberries and plums. On the palate the Neromora extremely dense and full-bodied affects with notes of dark berries, plums and some dried fruit. Wonderfully integrated and silky tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep purple in color. On the nose, the glass bursts with aromas of cocoa powder mingled with blackberries and vanilla. The palate bursts with juicy cherries and roasted figs.

Name: Selección
Wine Description: Intense, dark ruby red, very concentrated nose of berries, damsons, and figs, full-bodied, rich fruit cake and savoury vanilla flavours on the palate, well-structured, mellow, firm tannins with the fine elegance.

Name: Viña Arana Reserva
Wine Description: Medium robe, cherry red, clear and bright, with orange tones on the edge of the glass. Intense bouquet reminiscent of ripe berries and citric fruit. Medium-bodied and round on the palate, with sweet tannins blending with the slight acidity. Long aftertaste, with citric and balsamic aromas and flavours that ensure an excellent bouquet after time in the bottle.

Name: Dame Gaffelière Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: Vibrant nose of red and black fruits. The palate is oozing with ripe, juicy and fresh red fruit. Silky tannins and a long, generous finish.

Name: Classic Petite Sirah
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Poultry, Game (deer, venison)

Name: L' Âme de Pape Clément Graves
Pinot Noir Santa Barbara County
Wine Description: Aromas and flavors of strawberries and raspberries are joined by anise and clove notes with mouth filling intensity.

Name: Grand Vin de Reignac Bordeaux Supérieur
Syrah Rock-N-Roll
Wine Description: Rich, smokey and meaty with ripe blackberry and plum on the nose. Follows through on the palate.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bright, smooth, and rich ruby color with captivating aromas of black currant, red cherry, and spice are lifted out of the glass. The wine is inviting with a supple mouth-feel and notes of cassis, dark chocolate and ripe berries. The layers of complexity continue to develop throughout a silky finish.
